title: New: Death To Dreaming – Paris 1
content:
Yet another act gracing the pages of CitR whom seemingly have sprung up out of nowhere.

Their debut track Paris 1 has a rough round the edges feel to it, yet the refined shine of a well-produced indie gem. It’s remorseful and thought-provoking in parts, relying upon the Interpol like guitar line to carry the track. Death To Dreaming float with such ease that it’s impossible to find any flaws in particular, with Paris 1 sidling by with an effervescent charm. Check out Paris 1 below and grab a free download if you feel like it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
